title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Identify the key features, functionality, performance requirements, and security considerations for the DistributedPasswordCrackingCluster.

title: Design Architecture for Distributed Password Cracking Cluster
description: Create a high-level architecture design for the distributed password cracking cluster, considering scalability, reliability, and security. Propose solutions for data handling, task distribution, and communication between nodes to ensure efficient and secure operation.

title: Develop Password Cracking Algorithms
description: Design and implement various password cracking algorithms for distributed processing.

title: Create User Interface for Client Interaction
description: Develop a user-friendly interface for users to submit passwords, monitor progress, and manage their cluster.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design the database schema to store passwords, results, and cluster information. Develop necessary APIs for data access.

title: Implement Cluster Management and Scheduling System
description: Create a system to manage the cluster of machines, distribute tasks efficiently, and monitor progress.

title: Security Audit and Implementation
description: Perform a thorough security audit to ensure the system is secure against potential threats. Implement necessary security measures.

title: Unit Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Create and execute unit tests for each component of the system. Conduct system-level testing to verify functionality and performance.
dependencies: Create User Interface for Client Interaction
Implement Cluster Management and Scheduling System

title: Deploy the DistributedPasswordCrackingCluster
description: Prepare and deploy the system in a production environment. Monitor performance, resolve any issues, and ensure system security.
